        Parameters:
        p_conn - The JDBC connection.
        p_out - The ZIP output stream.
        p_dirExportRoot - The export root directory. The files should stored below this directory.

      • exportFilesForPortalExport

        public void exportFilesForPortalExport(de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.export.IExportFileWriter p_writer,
                                       de.uplanet.jdbc.JdbcConnection p_conn,
                                       boolean p_bCopyMarkedDirs)
        Description copied from interface: de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.export.IExportFileAdapter
        Is called on export. Copies the files to below the given export root directory.
        Specified by:
        exportFilesForPortalExport in interface de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.export.IExportFileAdapter
        Parameters:
        p_writer - The writer used for copy the files, stream or directory.
        p_conn - The JDBC connection.
        p_bCopyMarkedDirs - copy directories, event if they are marked with a ".noexport" file. If this parameter is set to false, the destination directory is created with a .noxexport file as the only content.
